DisplayForm.Script:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <UiScreen>
<Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./selectoraction" ></Op>
<Op type="Back" action="./" ></Op>
</Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>Select email address</Title> <Selection id="selectid email" multiple="true">
<Item selected="false" value="info@brother.be"> <Label>info@brother.be</Label> </Item>
<Item selected="false" value="sales@brother.be"> <Label>sales@brother.be</Label> </Item>
<Item selected="false" value="order@brother.be"> <Label>order@brother.be</Label> </Item>
<Item selected="true" value="support@brother.be"> <Label>support@brother.be</Label> </Item>
<Item selected="false" value="repair@brother.be"> <Label>repair@brother.be</Label> </Item>
</Selection> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
